metadata.title: Ewatchparts 18MM WATCH BAND BRACELET COMPATIBLE WITH PASHA DE CARTIER W31074M7 REF:2475 2324 2550 WATCH
features: USE A RULER TO MEASURE YOUR STRAP WIDTH OR CASE OPENING IN MM before purchasing to avoid returns as all models vary in size. We have a measurement guide in the image gallery to assist you if needed.
BAND MATERIAL: 316L Stainless Steel; BAND WIDTH: 18mm; BAND COLOR: Silver;
GENERIC replacement watch part - NO markings or logo
description: The item for sale is brand new aftermarket replacement Top Quality bracelet made of 316L Stainless Steel exact material which is use to make most of expensive Watches for 35mm Cartier Pasha W31074M7 Ref: 2475, 2324 , 2550 of OEM quality. The band is 18mm wide with 10mm opening at the end.The quality and craftsmanship of this band is stunning.Specification:  Length: 6.5"  Thickness: 3.00mm Center Link Opening: 10mmWeight: 61 gramNo logo or marking of any knid.With this band you can preserve your original band to maintain the value of your watch. The look and feel of the original at low price.
ALL BUYER :PLEASE READ DESCRIPTION OF THE ITEM IS SUITABLE FOR YOUR WATCH BEFORE MAKING YOUR PURCHASE ORDER TO AVOID RETURN/EXCHANGE.
All Customers Please Read The Following Before Purchasing:

Be sure to check our detailed measurement guide below or in the photos/images section of the listing to assist you with purchasing the correct parts for your watch. The guide will show you how to measure the lug width opening of your watch using a ruler, how to check your model number, and assist you with other questions you may have regarding measurement. Many watches appear the same but may be different in case size or year model. This will help to avoid any returns or exchanges. We are also an email away to assist with any questions you may have. Thank you for your business!

We sell only the best quality replacement watch parts and accessories for your watch. Your satisfaction is guaranteed or your money back! We have been in the watch parts industry for over 50 years and have been selling online for over 20 years. Buy with confidence from a reputable seller in the USA that you can trust! Visit our online store for a huge selection of other watch parts.
